title.en: A Prayer to the Root Guru1

text.en: Embodiment of all buddhas, treasure of boundless compassion,
text.en-trans: sangye kün ngö tsemé tukjé ter

text.en: Root guru, the very face and embodiment of all sources of refuge,
text.en-trans: kyab kün dü zhal tsawé lama la

text.en: To you I pray with unwavering and heartfelt longing:
text.en-trans: miché nying né dungwé solwa deb

text.en: Gaze on me with eyes of wisdom and inspire me with your blessings!
text.en-trans: yeshe chen gyi zik la jingyi lob
